info.title: Unified Ticketing API (Preview)
info.description:
:::note
This feature is only available in Preview to select customers on our Enterprise plan. [Contact us](mailto:team@supaglue.com) for more information.
:::
#### Introduction

Welcome to the Unified API (Ticketing) documentation. You can use this API to write to third-party providers.

[View common schema for Ticketing](https://docs.supaglue.com/platform/common-schemas/ticketing)

[![Run in Postman](https://run.pstmn.io/button.svg)](https://www.postman.com/supaglue/workspace/supaglue-public/overview)

#### Base API URL
```
https://api.supaglue.io/ticketing/v2
```

tags.name: Accounts
tags.description:
The Account object is used to represent the account that a ticket is associated with.

The account is a company that may be a customer. This does not represent the company that is receiving the ticket.

tags.name: Collections
tags.description: The Collection object is used to represent collections of tickets. Collections may include other collections as sub collections.

tags.name: Users
tags.description: The User object is used to represent an employee within a company.

tags.name: Contacts
tags.description: The Contact object is used to represent the customer, lead, or external user that a ticket is associated with.

tags.name: Teams
tags.description: The Team object is used to represent a team within the company receiving the ticket.

tags.name: Tickets
tags.description: The Ticket object is used to represent a ticket or a task within a system.

tags.name: Comments
tags.description: The Comment object is used to represent a comment on a ticket.

tags.name: Tags
tags.description: The Tag object is used to represent a tag or label for a ticket.

tags.name: Attachments
tags.description: The Attachment object is used to represent an attachment for a ticket.

x-api-key.name: x-api-key
x-api-key.description: API key to allow developers to access the API

body.example: When will these integrations be done? You all should use Supaglue.

html_body.example: When will these integrations be done? You all should use <b>Supaglue<b>.

x-customer-id.name: x-customer-id
x-customer-id.description: The customer ID that uniquely identifies the customer in your application

modified_after.name: modified_after
modified_after.description: If provided, will only return objects modified after this datetime. Datetime must be in ISO 8601 format and URI encoded.

modified_before.name: modified_before
modified_before.description: If provided, will only return objects modified before this datetime. Datetime must be in ISO 8601 format and URI encoded.

created_after.name: created_after
created_after.description: If provided, will only return objects created after this datetime. Datetime must be in ISO 8601 format and URI encoded.

created_before.name: created_before
created_before.description: If provided, will only return objects created before this datetime. Datetime must be in ISO 8601 format and URI encoded.

include_deleted_data.name: include_deleted_data
include_deleted_data.description: Whether to include data that was deleted in providers.

include_raw_data.name: include_raw_data
include_raw_data.description: Whether to include raw data fetched from the 3rd party provider.

page_size.name: page_size
page_size.description: Number of results to return per page. (Max: 1000)
